\input{conf/packages}
\input{conf/macros}
\input{conf/symbols}

\input{metadata/tog}
\input{metadata/paper}
\input{metadata/index}

%%% Supplementary material configuration %%%
%%% Makefile automatically manages this line. DO NOT EDIT.
%%% When commented supplement is rendered and vice versa.
% \includeonly{}
%%% Supplementary material configuration %%%

\begin{document}

\input{figures/teaser}
\input{sections/abstract}

\maketitle

\todolist

\input{sections/document}

\ifthenelse{\equal{\status}{0}} {          % INTERNAL Version
    \input{sections/acks}
}{}
\ifthenelse{\equal{\status}{3}} {          % CAMERA-READY Version
    \input{sections/acks}
}{}
\ifthenelse{\equal{\status}{4}} {          % CAMERA-READY AUTHOR Version
    \input{sections/acks}
}{}

% Bibliography
\bibliographystyle{acmart}
\bibliography{paper}

% Supplementary material
\appendixpageoff
\appendixtitleoff
\renewcommand{\appendixtocname}{Supplementary material}
\begin{appendices}
\crefalias{section}{supp}
\normalsize

\begin{filecontents}{\jobname-support.tex}
\clearpage
\pagenumbering{roman}
\input{sections/supp}
\end{filecontents}
\include{\jobname-support}
\end{appendices}

\end{document}
\endinput
